thread.section_title: Spotahome opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Spotahome | www.spotahome.com
thread.title: Henri Th

author: Henri Th
title: Henri Th
text:
Easy to understand site with pictures and videos that give you a sound idea of what the apartment is like. When I was being a bit difficult Spotahome gave me great help with the landlord, and in such a friendly way over the phone that I almost got worried that things were running too smoothly! Thank you very much for the help Ang√©lica!
You might pay a little bit more than for directly traded apartments/rooms but it gets worth it if you encounter an issue. Also help was very quick which is always a huge plus when you're not feeling at ease.
